concept.title: Jira
concept.shortdesc: Jira Software is a part of a family of products designed to help teams of all types manage work.

conbody.p: JIRA is a tool developed by Australian Company Atlassian. This software is used for bug tracking, issue tracking, and project management.
In order to report your progress, follow the plan, and respond to change, you will need robust Agile project management tools such as user stories, epics, themes, and initiatives.
Themes are large focus areas that span the organization.
Initiatives are collections of epics that drive toward a common goal.
Epics are large bodies of work that can be broken down into a number of smaller tasks (called stories).
Stories, also called “user stories,” are short requirements or requests written from the perspective of an end user.
Sub-Tasks are the sub-tasks of an issue.
